actions.deleteSalesChannel: Delete Search Engine and Product Export

delete.title: Delete Search Engine
delete.text: Do you want to delete this Search Engine? Not only the link but but the DooFinder Search Engine itself will be deleted!

create.title: Create Search Engine
create.text: Create your Search Engine for the selected Store. Its not possible to move the Search Engine to another Store later on.

success.title: Successful
success.deleteLink: The connection between Shopware and DooFinder was successfully cut.
success.createSearchEngine: The Search Engine was successfully created.
success.linkSearchEngine: The Search Engine was successfully linked.
success.deleteSearchEngine: The Search Engine was successfully deleted.

error.title: Error Message
error.languageAndCurrencyAlreadyInUse: This Search Engine can't be used, another on with the same Language and Currency is already in use within this Store.
error.searchEngineAlreadyInUse: This Search Engine is already in use. Please delete the link before you try to connect it to another Product Export.

intedia-doofinder-recommendation-button.button: Enable DooFinder Recommendation in DooFinder Admin
